summary: So, here I come again, Avengers!
body:
So, here I come again, Avengers!

Okay, Marvel fans, I’m telling you this three weeks in advance, so here we go: as someone who works in a movie theater, I’m begging you, at the premiere don’t be an asshole to the people working there!

There are a lot of young people working at the cinemas because they need an income! And these type of movies (the marvel ones) are the hardest for us, movie theater workers. We have to work at midnight and even breakdown because we are needed there to attend the costumers. I’m going to work at the premiere, the last feature is at 2:30 a.m. (at the moment), my shift is going to end at 4:00 a.m. and then I have to go to my 7:00 am class at college, and just like me, there’s lots of workers that have that kind of schedule, so: be patient, know what you want to order, don’t try to sneak to others theaters, be clean!!!! (we, workers, have to stay after the movie ended to clean up the cinema, so please, I know y’all excited but that doesn’t mean you have to leave mountains of popcorn and trash in your seat), be at your best behavior and don’t try to record the film! Let’s have a great time watching the movie and help the movie theater workers have a peaceful end of shift. Maybe there is going to be problems, but let the people who manage the theater solve them and be kind and patient!

Also, if a worker tells you there isn’t more merchandise of the movie, or there isn’t something you want to buy, remember that there’s a lot of people and that’s the reason of why, you aren’t the only one who wants to buy things and it isn’t our fault there isn’t more because merchandise is limited.

Be respectful, don’t try to steal anything (if you want a poster or something like that, you can ask nicely to a manager, and maybe you’ll get it).

Well, enjoy the movie and let’s hope your favorite superhero survive!

summary: Joe Russo Reveals Why Brie Larson's Captain Marvel Looks Different in Avengers: Endgame Trailers
title: Joe Russo Reveals Why Brie Larson's Captain Marvel Looks Different in Avengers: Endgame Trailers
body:
Joe Russo Reveals Why Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel Looks Different in Avengers: Endgame Trailers

Avengers: Endgame director Joe Russo revealed why Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel looks different in the Avengers: Endgame trailers as compared to the Captain Marvel movie.

Russo spoke to SlashFilm while at Cinema Con revealing it was Brie Larson’s choice.

“This was Brie’s first time playing the character. She [filmed Avengers: Endgame] before she filmed Captain Marvel, and I think she was…

body:
Randomly thinking about what would it be like the first time Talos’s daughter called him ‘dad’ and how happy that would have made him.. the best thing that happened to me today

I just love imagining them bonding and being happy and everything…

tags: I am still so excited about it
summary: Captain Marvel; This is gonna be long, so read more below[[MORE]] I adored the quick friendship between Carol and Fury. Monica...
body:
Captain Marvel;

This is gonna be long, so read more below

I adored the quick friendship between Carol and Fury.

Monica was freaking amazing and ganging up on Maria with Carol to go to space, seriously. The best. She also has the absolute best fashion scense, I love the color sceme she chose for the suit. (The neon was fun, too, though.)

Fury is a cat person, who would have throught? (Those scenes were adorable. And the fact that he hid how he lost his eeye, oh my gosh, Fury. Also ‘J’ stands for ‘Joseph’ and that was a mystery I didn’t know I wanted the answer to.)

Also, Fury singing, yes, please!

I knew it was Mar-Vel when the name Lawson was dropped. I knew it!!!

Maria and Carol hugging brought tears to my eyes.

And of course the Kree are the bad guys and the Skrulls were only trying to live in peace and seriously Fuck the Kree.

Everyone’s reactions to Goose were great, really. Like the humans’ amusement, before they found she wasn’t just a cat, to Talos’s reaction and Maria’s and Fury’s faces when Goose ate up the Tesseract and those Kree, priceless. Though, I am still lost on how Mar-Vel ended up with it in the first place, is a point that I would like an explanation on.

Carol finding out who she was and standing up against the controling Kree A.I., blasting whatshisface and then sending him to Hala with a declaration of war? 👌 Even Ronan backed off and it’s cute he thinks he can capture her. Dude, you’re in for a rude awakening. Wait, sorry you’re toast already.

Poor New Guy, getting forgotten at the Blockbuster Store… And letting the two go at the stairs is probably the start of why Fury ends up thinking of the man as his one good eye.

Secret Scene 1; Carol’s “Where is Fury?” like she is about to go a few rounds with everyone in the room until she finds out what happened, gave me chills.

Secret Scene 2; Goose threw up a ‘weird’ furball. *snickers*

The music was dope.

The opening got me emotional, too.

Maria and Carol hugging brought tears to my eyes.

And of course the Kree are the bad guys and the Skrulls were only trying to live in peace and seriously Fuck the Kree.

Everyone’s reactions to Goose were great, really. Like the humans’ amusement, before they found she wasn’t just a cat, to Talos’s reaction and Maria’s and Fury’s faces when Goose ate up the Tesseract and those Kree, priceless. Though, I am still lost on how Mar-Vel ended up with it in the first place, is a point that I would like an explanation on.

Carol finding out who she was and standing up against the controling Kree A.I., blasting whatshisface and then sending him to Hala with a declaration of war? 👌 Even Ronan backed off and it’s cute he thinks he can capture her. Dude, you’re in for a rude awakening. Wait, sorry you’re toast already.

Poor New Guy, getting forgotten at the Blockbuster Store… And letting the two go at the stairs is probably the start of why Fury ends up thinking of the man as his one good eye.

Secret Scene 1; Carol’s “Where is Fury?” like she is about to go a few rounds with everyone in the room until she finds out what happened, gave me chills.

Secret Scene 2; Goose threw up a ‘weird’ furball. *snickers*

The music was dope.

The opening got me emotional, too.
trail.content_abstract:
Captain Marvel;

This is gonna be long, so read more below

body: Captain Marvel is a Qween

trail.content: Captain Marvel is a Qween
